content.label: Move Feature bugged. Stuck in place.
No hidden things just straight fun!
This game got boring after a while so I recommend you don‚Äôt get it
I haven‚Äôt played this game in a while but I just went back to find it because it genuinely is one of the best games I‚Äôve ever played I can‚Äôt express it enough I love this game
It‚Äôs a great game, but only problem is when I build a hallway. The build menu says hallway cost 1000 but when I build it takes 10000 out of my money. Which is correct?

This is the BEST of the builder type games I‚Äôve played. The throwback pixel graphics brings the innocence back to video games!

If you don‚Äôt over spend into too deep of debt- you really don‚Äôt have to wait long to build stuff. Unlike some ‚ÄúTycoon‚Äù games where you need to spend real money and wait overnight for game credits- you pay one fee upfront WITH NO IN APP PURCHASESüòÅ and there‚Äôs no prolonged waiting.

You get a real sense of accomplishment with so many things to do you won‚Äôt get bored.

It‚Äôs really addicting and I highly recommended it!

Wonderful example of Kairosoft's expertise in tycoon games. I loved playing this game and want more, though I understand this game might not receive updates any time soon, and that's fine. It was a great use of time, and I highly recommend it.
This is my all time favorite. The videogame one is a close second followed by cruise ship story. Great time killer
Best company when it comes to pixel games.After they say the games over you can still play and unlock more stores and items. You can play this for hours. 100% Best Game and App

I love this game and kairosoft!! Although their apps are pricy which is a minor problem to the game... the game is mostly depended on by patience which is alright. I love the art style and the game really hyped me up sometimes. Although it's a bit pricy, I would recommend. :)

So I'm an avid simulation game player and I used to love sim tower when I was younger so I decided to give this game a try. Well it wasn't very long before I was completely hooked on it. Mega mall story is a wonderful tower/store simulation game. There are a large variety of stores and facilities that you can build and many different types of customers to serve. The graphics are cute and colorful and game's UI is very easy to use. I've been playing it for hours at a time. One again Kairo has delivered a delightfully complex yet easy to understand sim game that you can play over and over again and without those infuriating in-app purchases that most games require you to buy to fully enjoy the experience. Well worth the $5 price. My only wish is that the devs would add some more content in an update. Thanks guys!

Very cute and fun game with good replayability. The only suggestion I have is that rival malls should not appear so often after you‚Äôve completed all investment plans as that‚Äôs the only way you can get rid of them besides waiting for two years (in the game) for them to go bankrupt. Other than that, Mega Mall Story is a solid app!

Many hours of fun. Very in depth. It's not one of those builder games where you have to wait for things, it's actually pretty fast paced. The amount of content makes it so that you can't finish the game in a day.

Hallways cost like 16,000$ and increasing for each one I place down, when it should be 1,000$ and I was wondering why I was doing so bad, that's why! It's a really great game but Jesus you need to fix it, it really slows down game progress like a lot.
Love this game!  Super addictive!

I love this game. I can play this for hours on end, but there are some issues that need to be fixed. 

First, the mall rankings. Before the most recent update, I could easily rank #1 so I could get the casino.  Now, no matter how much money I rack up with any of my stores(after continuously using hold sale every month) I always rank #5.  I even got close to making $10,000,000 and I STILL got #5!  I don't know if it's the way I'm playing or if it's a bug, but it needs to be fixed. 

Second, the cost of placing different shops, facilities, hallways, etc.  Before the update, if say a hallway costed $1000 to make, that's what it costed. Now, it's far more expensive. Let's say if I make 10 hallways, it doesn't cost $10,000 like it used to.  It's more like $250,000 or some other ridiculous amount like that, and the cost INCREASES as I make more floors!  This is the same with making shops, adding facilities, etc. 

I love this game, I really do. It's a nice little distraction for me when I need it. But these bugs need to be fixed.

title.label: Please go back to old update

content.label: This was a 5 star game until the 2016 update. I don't like the unnecessary lighting of the sun. I don't like the little hand and I don't like how everything speeds up at the end. Please change back.

You know what was fun? Unlocking each store 1 by 1. Now that I've cleared the game, everything is unlocked already. That's not fun to me. Could you at least include the option for a fresh start please? I paid for this app, so I might as well play it.

Before the 2016 update, it was perfect. Now it lags because of all the unnecessary lighting and weather effects, and you've changed the points at which you get stuff like the cinema. Please change it back.
Hours of entertainment

I absolutely love this game! It is so fun and addictive. However, there needs to be more! More stores, space, projects...because once you buy all the stores and finish all of the projects the game gets a little boring. Please add more!!

title.label: Fun, but needs a few things

content.label: Had lots of fun with this, but I feel like there should have been at least 1 more mall expansion to give you a little more room to grow.
these apps are so underrated and good

title.label: Not working on iPhone 6s latest update

content.label: Game is fun but now all screen taps are barely responsive. I have to tap screen multiple times to register one tap
This is a super fun game.

title.label: I really really really really really really really like this game

content.label: It's a really good game and btw make bonbon camera for iOS on iTunes please
Such an amazing game, have been playing it for over 3 years with long breaks in between, and have restarted several times, it's addicting and it deserves the money

I give major props to kairosoft for making this game. So many iOS developers make games that have pointless wait times. You can't play clash of clans, you check in on it occasionally for ten minutes of fun. This game is great that it removes pointless wait times.

Absolutely love this game. The concept is great, the design is adorable, and I can play it for hours on end. I personally love simulation games, and this is one of the best I've come across on mobile. Highly recommended and worth the price, like many kairosoft games are.
I love this game! It is super addicting and fun. I spent so much time playing and I only got it yesterday! I think I've played for 7 hours already.
Just like each and every Kairosoft game, this game is 100% worth it. If you're considering buying this game but you aren't sure, DO IT. You will not regret buying any Kairosoft games ever.
This game represents a classic mall simulation in which one may have the freedom the be creative but still have a challenge. One of my favorite games made by Kairosoft of ALL TIME!
This is the best game I have ever played and I'm on year 36 and I got everything unlocked and everyone is a regular
I this game everyday. It's a great game. I highly recommend playing this game. It's really fun. Great game!!

I really liked this little game. I took a gamble on it because it was about three or four dollars when I bought it but I ended up really enjoying it. Maybe it's because of my soft spot for 90s style 'sim' games, and this one reminds me a lot of an old Maxis game called "Sim Tower," which was always my favorite. But it's well worth the price if you like malls and can remember the halcyon days of simple fun.
This is a good game it just needs more stores in lower levels.All in all it is a good game
I am enjoying playing all the Kairosoft titles. Just waiting on Biz Builder Delux to come to iOS.
it can't play on ipad air 2. Very sad. Sorry for my bad english.

Nice to see Kairosoft updating their apps to work with newer models!

You wouldn't know it based off their app updates which usually only say bug fixes, but they have been going back and updating older games.
This is one of the best games out there but it needs a new update to iOS7.
It's fun and all, but please make an iPad version!!!!

Since you guys have not released Game Dev Story 2, please update this for iPhone 5 screen size and retina iPad. 

Great game that could really take advantage of the iPhone5 widescreen or iPad full screen.
